about_the_game:
Dive headfirst into the mind-bending world of Psychoverse City, where gravity takes a vacation and the neon-soaked cityscape awaits your platforming skills. Get ready for a retro-fueled adventure that will transport you back to the groovy 80s!

Embark on a psychedelic journey as you traverse a series of uninterrupted levels, leaping and dashing atop wiggly and twisty buildings. Feel the rush as you smash through ad-boards, only to grapple-hook onto floating cars like a true action hero. And hey, who needs stairs when you can bounce off massive fans and zip-line through a flurry of city debris?

But here's the twist: you're not just a player, you're the star of an epic advertisement! Take commands from a director who's filming the ultimate showcase of Psychoverse City. Strike your best poses, capture the most jaw-dropping shots of each scene, and let your inner superstar shine.

Imagine a fusion of the fast-paced gameplay of Mirror's Edge, the exhilaration of a Ninja Warrior course, and sprinkle in a generous dose of pink-tinted trippiness. That's the essence of Psychoverse City—an electrifying, corny, and outrageously fun adventure you won't want to miss!

Get ready to groove to adrenaline-pumping beats, unleash your inner ninja, and embrace the cheesy goodness of the 80s.

Disclaimer: Side effects may include an uncontrollable urge to wear neon leg warmers and break out into spontaneous dance moves. Proceed with caution!

reviews:
“What drew me into checking this one was the outstanding synthwave audio and style. We’re a few days after the event and I can still vividly recall the soundtrack of the game, which is always a good sign.”
ThisGenGaming at INDIGOx

“One of the rawest and most striking projects is that of Lee Hammoud, called Psychoverse City”
short_description: Dive into the trippy gravity shifted world of PSYCHOVERSE CITY and platform across the rooftops of an ever-evolving cityscape, accompanied by adrenalin-pumping beats!
